title: Maruti Suzuki partners with Union Bank of India for dealer financing solutions
description: Maruti Suzuki India has signed an initial agreement with Union Bank of India to provide dealer financing solutions, expanding funding options for its 4,000+ sales outlets nationwide. MSI Senior Executive Officer Shashank Srivastava emphasized their commitment to dealer network support, aligning efforts with market demands.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
